DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate prevalence , plaque characteristic ( plaque type , stenosis degree , remodel ) predictor coronary atherosclerosis stroke patient coronary CT angiography .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Coronary Artery Disease Stroke Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Stroke coronary artery disease ( CAD ) share common risk factor pathological mechanism . CAD important cause death patient stroke . Currently , coronary CT angiography ( CCTA ) useful non-invasive tool detection CAD plaque analysis . Therefore , investigator aim evaluate prevalence , plaque characteristic ( plaque type , stenosis degree , remodel ) predictor CAD stroke patient follow-up ( 5 year ) use CCTA .
DOC.criteria: Acute stroke patient diagnosed clinical brain MR imaging Who perform coronary CT angiography within 3 month acute stroke intracranial hemorrhage include intracerebral , subdural subarachnoid hemorrhage brain tumor Previous myocardial infarction Previously perform percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) , coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) cardiac surgery Insufficient medical record Poor image quality CCTA scan
